prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small penguin with a cute expression and fluffy feathers.
Imagine a tiny blue bird Pokemon with a round body and a playful personality, perfect for a starter.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek blue exterior and an adorable face that could inhabit icy waters.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that loves to play in the sea and has bright, shiny feathers.
Make a Pokemon that has a cheerful demeanor and can be found in grasslands and wetlands.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon that features a blue body and a distinct yellow beak, showcasing its playful nature.
Give me a Pokemon that is small, blue, and has a love for adventure in various habitats.
